Column Comment.0: STORE ID: Unique identifier for the data store location.
Column Comment.1: STRUCTURE OBSERVATION NUMBER: Unique identifier for this observation of adata storage structure.
Column Comment.2: ITEM OBSERVATION NUMBER: Unique identifier for the row describing the kinds ofinformation item that may be stored in a data store or group of data stores.
Column Comment.3: ACTIVE INDICATOR: A Y/N flag indicating whether this row of data is currently eitheractive / valid (Y) or inactive / invalid (N).
Column Comment.4: EFFECTIVE DATE: date on which the data in this row came into effect.
Column Comment.5: EXPIRY DATE: Date on which the data in this row of data was no longer in effect.
Column Comment.6: INFORMATION ITEM CATEGORY: the category of information item, such as May beAcquisition support products, trace products, well file etc.
Column Comment.7: ITEM SUB CATEGORY: The sub category of information, such as survey notes,drillers reports etc.
Column Comment.8: ROW_MANAGEMENT_GUID: This value may be used to provide a global uniqueidentifier for this row of data. Use of this column is not mandatory, but if used,optional PPDM NOT NULL and UNIQUE INDEX constraints provided in the datamodel DDL should be created.
Column Comment.9: REMARK: Narrative remarks about this row of data.
Column Comment.10: SOURCE: The individual, company, state, or government agency designated as thesource of information for this row.
Column Comment.11: TOTAL CAPACITY: the total number of data store units in this one that have thedescribed configuration.
Column Comment.12: USED CAPACITY: the total number of data store units within this one with thedescribed configuration that are currently occupied or unavailable for use.
Column Comment.13: USED CAPACITY DATE: the date when the used capacity was last calculated ormeasured.
Column Comment.14: ROW CHANGED BY: Application login id of the user who last changed the row.
Column Comment.15: ROW CHANGED DATE: System date of the last time the row was changed.
Column Comment.16: ROW CREATED BY: System user who created this row of data.
Column Comment.17: ROW CREATED DATE: Date that the row was created on.
Column Comment.18: ROW_EFFECTIVE_DATE: A system assigned date that specified when a row of datais effective from a systems perspective. This may be the date that a row of data wasmade available to end users, for example.
Column Comment.19: ROW_EXPIRY_DATE: A system assigned date that specified when a row of data isno longer effective from a systems perspective. This may be the date that a row ofdata was no longer available to end users, for example.
Column Comment.20: PPDM ROW QUALITY: A set of values indicating the quality of data in this row,usually with reference to the method or procedures used to load the data, althoughother types of quality reference are permitted.
